abstract: Soccer Roundup; Haji Wright has reportedly agreed to sign with New York Cosmos.
lead_paragraph: The Cosmos are expected to formally announce the signing of Wright, a star for the United States’ under-17 national team, as early as Monday.

headline.main: Haji Wright, a Rising 17-Year-Old American, Is Said to Join the Cosmos
headline.print_headline: Rising 17-Year-Old American Is Said to Join Cosmos

snippet: The Cosmos are expected to formally announce the signing of Wright, a star for the United States’ under-17 national team, as early as Monday.
